Respond with ONLY the category name, nothing else.

Categorize this review: OK for entry-level apple user. DO NOT BUY SMALL SCREEN APPLE MOBILE. WASTE OF MONEY. NO RESELLING VALUE. Those who like to enjoy Apple ecosystem with a minimum amount of money may opt this. But with the latest processor and without any other (display. Camera etc) advanced options may be the negative point one has to decide before buying.READ MORE
